answers.answer: When I was 17 weeks yes I felt the same way, make sure your not a little anemic or you may have to take iron pills and vitamins C. Thats very normal.

Hey I feel like that when I push my self to much, At the time im doing stuff I feel like I'm taking it easy but then I feel it, i need to lay down. Im 29wks now so I've learned my limit ( but sometimes I still dip to much ehh) just take it easy and rest when ur body needs it
I was also like this they suggested to get foods high in protein and they found out I was anemic. I went on iron pills and have been eating differently have been much better.
Thanks for responding! I did have to take iron pills my first pregnancy 8 yrs ago so i dont remember about how i felt at this stage. Ill keep thay in mind and bring up with my doc.
I was the same way when I was around 17 weeks. I would be at work and feel like i was going to pass out found out I have gestational diabetes.  I hope its not the same for you
I was the same way when I was around 17 weeks. I would be at work and feel like i was going to pass out found out I have gestational diabetes.  I hope its not the same for you

question: So ladies do any of u feel like this? The last few days ive been feeling lightheaded a little weak legs been real achey feeling... ugh i just want to lay down and dont feel like sitting up or standing. Btw im 17 wks. Maybe ive just pushed myself too much the past few days?
title: i just want to lay down somewhere...
